pr_title: chat notification: Apply notifyOnOwnName when player-mentioned only

timeline.message:
chat notification: Apply notifyOnOwnName when player-mentioned only

In an attempt to curb notification spam during PVM and other activities, this commit changes the behavior of the config in that it now only notifies the user when their name is mentioned by a player in public, private, or friends chat, rather than every single time their name is mentioned.

timeline.bodyText: you can probably just use an if () for this.
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyText: this is missing modchat, modprivatechat, (is there a modfriendschat?)
